Name: Goals
Description: Number of goals scored by the player.
FormulaConcept: Count events where type='shot' and event_successful=1 and credited as goal to event_player_1.
LLMNotes: Use with TOI or shots to compute rates like goals/60 or shooting%.

Name: Primary Assists
Description: Assists that are the final pass before a goal.
FormulaConcept: Count goal events where player appears as primary assister in play_detail or event_details_1/2.
ExtraDataNeeded: Needs consistent encoding of assist roles.
LLMNotes: Primary assists often better reflect playmaking than total assists.

Name: Secondary Assists
Description: Assists that are one step removed from the goal (secondary pass).
FormulaConcept: Similar to A1 but for secondary assist tags in play detail columns.
LLMNotes: Separate from A1 so you can compute A1/A2 mix.

Name: Points
Description: Goals + assists.
FormulaConcept: PTS = G + (A1 + A2).
LLMNotes: Traditional scoring stat; use with TOI for points/60.

Name: Even-Strength TOI per 60
Description: Even-strength time on ice normalized per 60 minutes.
FormulaConcept: TOI_EV_60 = (sum(shift_duration where strength='5v5') / 60).
LLMNotes: Captures 5v5 deployment; compare across games or players.

Name: Plus / Minus
Description: Goal differential while player is on ice at even strength.
FormulaConcept: PLUS_MINUS = goals_for_on_ice - goals_against_on_ice (EV situations).
LLMNotes: Legacy metric; noisy, but familiar for coaches and players.

Name: Corsi For
Description: Shot attempts for while the player/team is on the ice (shots+misses+blocks).
FormulaConcept: Count events where type in {shot,miss,block} and on-ice team is shooting team.
ExtraDataNeeded: Need miss & block events consistently logged.
LLMNotes: Puck-possession proxy; use with CA for Corsi%.

Name: Corsi Against
Description: Shot attempts against while player is on ice.
FormulaConcept: Same as CF but for opponent team.
LLMNotes: Combine with CF for Corsi differential and share.

Name: Corsi Percentage
Description: Share of Corsi attempts for vs total when player is on ice.
FormulaConcept: CF_PCT = CF / (CF + CA).
LLMNotes: Key shot share metric; used heavily in public analytics.

Name: Fenwick For
Description: Unblocked shot attempts for (shots+misses).
FormulaConcept: Count type in {shot,miss} for team while player on ice.
LLMNotes: Similar to CF but slightly closer to goal probability.

Name: High-Danger Corsi For
Description: Shot attempts from high-danger areas while player is on ice.
FormulaConcept: Count Corsi events where danger_zone='high' or shot_xy in HD polygon.
ExtraDataNeeded: Danger classification or polygons per rink.
LLMNotes: Mirrors public HD metrics; useful for chance quality, not just volume.

Name: Shot Distance
Description: Distance from shot location to net (feet).
FormulaConcept: sqrt((x - net_x)^2 + (y - net_y)^2) in rink coords.
LLMNotes: Important feature for xG and shot profiling.

Name: Shot Angle
Description: Angle of shot relative to center of net.
FormulaConcept: atan2(|y - net_y|, |x - net_x|) in degrees.
LLMNotes: Combined with distance; steep angles usually lower xG.

Name: Shot-Level Expected Goals
Description: Probability a single shot becomes a goal.
FormulaConcept: xG = model(distance,angle,shot_type,pre-shot movement,rebound,rush,etc).
ExtraDataNeeded: Training data of many shots with outcomes + model.
LLMNotes: Core feature of modern hockey analytics (Evolving-Hockey/MoneyPuck style).

Name: On-Ice Expected Goals For
Description: Sum of xG for shots taken by team while player is on ice.
FormulaConcept: xGF_ON = Σ xG_SHOT where shooting_team==player_team and player on ice.
ExtraDataNeeded: xG_SHOT values must be computed first.
LLMNotes: Better on-ice measure than raw GF; adjusts for shot quality.

Name: On-Ice Expected Goals Against
Description: Sum of xG for shots against while player is on ice.
FormulaConcept: xGA_ON = Σ xG_SHOT where shooting_team!=player_team and player on ice.
LLMNotes: Use with xGF_ON to build xGF% and expected goal differential.

Name: xG Percentage
Description: Share of expected goals for vs total while player is on ice.
FormulaConcept: xGF_PCT = xGF_ON / (xGF_ON + xGA_ON).
LLMNotes: Key quality-adjusted territorial metric.

Name: Controlled Zone Entries For
Description: Entries into OZ with possession (carry or completed pass).
FormulaConcept: Count events where type='zone_entry' and event_detail_1 in {'carry','pass'} and event_successful=1.
LLMNotes: Microstat widely used by AllThreeZones/JFresh; correlates with offense.

Name: Dump-and-Chase Entries For
Description: Zone entries where team sends puck in without immediate possession (dump, chip).
FormulaConcept: Count events type='zone_entry' and event_detail_1 in {'dump','chip'}
LLMNotes: Lets you compare controlled vs dump entry profiles.

Name: Controlled Entry Rate
Description: Share of entries that are controlled.
FormulaConcept: CONTROLLED_ENTRY_RATE = CONTROLLED_ENTRY_FOR / (CONTROLLED_ENTRY_FOR + DUMP_ENTRY_FOR).
LLMNotes: Higher values suggest better transition puck management.

Name: Entry Denials
Description: Number of times player stops an opposition entry at blue line.
FormulaConcept: Count zone_entry attempts by opponent where event_successful=0 and defender is event_player_1.
LLMNotes: Key defensive microstat; especially for defensemen.

Name: Controlled DZ Exits
Description: Defensive-zone exits where team leaves zone with possession.
FormulaConcept: Count events type='zone_exit' and event_detail_1 in {'carry','pass'} and success=1.
LLMNotes: Important for breakout analysis and puck-moving defense.

Name: Rush Chances For
Description: Shots or chances generated quickly after a full-ice rush.
FormulaConcept: Identify sequences: DZ exit with control → NZ possession → OZ entry with control → shot within N seconds.
ExtraDataNeeded: Sequence table linking events in time.
LLMNotes: Used in many public models to distinguish rush vs cycle offense.

Name: Giveaways
Description: Times a player loses puck directly to opponent while under control.
FormulaConcept: Count events type='turnover' where event_player_1 is giver and not an intentional dump/clear/miss shot.
ExtraDataNeeded: Classification rules distinguishing dumps vs mistakes.
LLMNotes: You requested refined giveaways excluding dumps/clears/miss shots.

Name: Takeaways
Description: Times player steals puck from opponent, gaining possession.
FormulaConcept: Count events type in {'takeaway','stick_lift','interception'} credited to player.
LLMNotes: Important defensive disruptor microstat.

Name: Offensive Zone Possession Time
Description: Time spent controlling puck in offensive zone.
FormulaConcept: Sum durations of sequences labeled zone='OZ' and possession_team=team.
ExtraDataNeeded: Need clear sequences and possession logic.
LLMNotes: Cycle-heavy teams will show high OZ possession time.

Name: Goals Saved Above Expected
Description: How many goals a goalie prevents relative to expected based on shot quality.
FormulaConcept: GSAx = Σ xG_SHOT_faced - goals_allowed.
LLMNotes: Key modern goalie stat; used widely by Evolving-Hockey/MoneyPuck.

Name: High-Danger Save Percentage
Description: Save percentage on high-danger shots.
FormulaConcept: HD_SV% = (HD_shots_faced - HD_goals_allowed) / HD_shots_faced.
LLMNotes: Evaluates performance on toughest chances.

Name: Line Corsi For per 60
Description: Shot attempts for per 60 whilst a specific line combo is on ice.
FormulaConcept: CF per line / TOI_line * 60.
LLMNotes: For optimizing line combos and matchups.

Name: WOWY Goal Diff
Description: Change in GF% for a player when a specific teammate is with vs without them.
FormulaConcept: WOWY_GF_DIFF = GF%(with) - GF%(without).
LLMNotes: Used for with-or-without-you evaluation and player synergy.

Name: Max Skate Speed
Description: Highest instantaneous skating speed.
FormulaConcept: speed_t = distance(pos_t,pos_{t-1})/Δt; SKATE_SPEED_MAX = max(speed_t).
LLMNotes: NHL Edge publishes similar speed metrics.

Name: Rush Acceleration
Description: Peak acceleration during rush sequences.
FormulaConcept: During rush segments, accel_t=(speed_t-speed_{t-1})/Δt; take max.
LLMNotes: Differentiate elite rush skaters from slower players.

Name: Average Defensive Gap
Description: Average distance between defender and puck carrier in NZ/OZ.
FormulaConcept: At each frame, identify nearest defender to carrier; average separation.
LLMNotes: Key concept in modern defensive coaching.

Name: Giveaways vs Elite Opponents
Description: Giveaways a player commits while facing lines with avg rating ≥ threshold.
FormulaConcept: For each giveaway, compute avg opponent rating on ice; count if >= threshold.
LLMNotes: Provides rating-aware turnover context (your request).

Name: OZ Time vs Weaker Lines
Description: Proportion of OZ possession time when player’s line is higher-rated than opponent’s.
FormulaConcept: Sum OZ possession where team_avg_rating > opp_avg_rating / total OZ time.
LLMNotes: Contextualizes OZ dominance vs matchup difficulty.

Name: Rating-Adjusted Sequence xG
Description: xG for a sequence adjusted for offensive and defensive line ratings.
FormulaConcept: xG_adj = base_xG * f(avg_att_rating,avg_def_rating).
ExtraDataNeeded: Model for f and sequence xG.
LLMNotes: Brings your rating system into expected-goals logic.

Name: Entry Clips Count
Description: Number of video clips generated for OZ entries by player.
FormulaConcept: Count events type='zone_entry' with non-null video_url_start for player.
LLMNotes: Useful for film review workloads: how many clips to watch.

Name: Clip Watch Time per Player
Description: Total duration of all video clips tagged to player’s events.
FormulaConcept: Sum(clip_end - clip_start) across all clips for player.
LLMNotes: Can be used to size coaching workload or generate auto-reels.
